name: Whiskers
description: A calm and dignified kitty who loves to lounge in the sun.

name: Paws
description: A playful kitten with a love for string toys and cuddles.

name: Socks
description: An adventurous cat with a curious personality.

name: Ginger
description: A serene and beautiful cat with a gentle disposition.

name: Coco
description: A chatty feline who enjoys being the center of attention.

name: Shadow
description: A shy and graceful cat, Shadow warms up quickly to kindness.

name: Mittens
description: A little bundle of energy with striking markings.

name: Oliver
description: Oliver loves a good scratch and will purr your ear off for one.

name: Bella
description: Bella enjoys company and will often seek out a warm lap.

name: Luna
description: With her blue eyes and soft fur, Luna is a delight to pet.

name: Simba
description: Simba may be small, but his heart is mighty.

name: Max
description: Max is a playful explorer who's always on the hunt for fun.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is as sweet as she is fluffy, which is to say very!

name: Oscar
description: Oscar is a seasoned snuggler and a friend to all he meets.

name: Zoe
description: Zoe has a regal bearing and a soft, silky coat.
